.footer { color:var(--muted); text-align:center; padding:2rem 1rem; font-size:0.95rem; border-top:1px solid #eef2f7; margin-top:3rem; }
.footer .social a { margin:0 .5rem; color:var(--muted); text-decoration:none; }
.meta { font-size:0.9rem; color:var(--muted); }
@media (max-width:720px) { .hero{flex-direction:column;text-align:center;} .hero img{width:120px;height:120px;} .header{padding:0.5rem 1rem;} }
